ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: That was the most pathetic excuse for a response I have ever seen.  How many times did GZ personally assure us that the Practice Lute and Small Brass Trumpet
ygData.messageBody:
That was the most pathetic excuse for a response I have ever seen. How many
times did GZ personally assure us that the Practice Lute and Small Brass
Trumpet were in game? At least once in my presence in full view of many
others at the infamous "snake testing". Obviously bards just aren't a "high
priority" for anything. We aren't casters so who cares... obviously no one
at Verant.

Kitasi Tailor, Smith, and forever 31st level

-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 11, 2000 9:17 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of


http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/022892.html

apparently many of our songs are "working as intended" or "may need to be
re-evaluated at some point"

this may be the end for me.

= (

Draelon Stormsong
Semi Retired Minstrel


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
